author: Spencer Morgan For Mailonline
title: Chelsea duo Willian and David Luiz play game of Teqball | Daily Mail Online
text: WHAT IS TEQBALL? Teqball is an innovative new sport that combines elements from football and table tennis. The equipment is a training tool for both professionals and amateurs to develop their technical, concentration skills, and stamina. Willian took to his Instagram on Monday evening to share the experience as the group assembled the unique Teqboard before himself and Luiz took on two friends in a game. Surprisingly for his Â£4.1million followers, the clip saw the focused Brazilian pair outdone by their unknown opponents in an impressive rally. The equipment is a training tool for both professionals and amateurs to develop their technical, concentration skills, and stamina. It has become increasingly popular in recent months with the likes of the legendary Ronaldinho often sharing videos of himself playing. Luiz and Willian will return to more serious training in the coming days as Chelsea look to continue their Premier League domination against Swansea at Stamford Bridge on Saturday. The Chelsea duo were bested by their friends after a highly-competitive ralley Willian also shared images of the group assembling the unique piece of equipment RELATED ARTICLES
